page.title: 06HOUSES IN MILTON'S D BLOCK.
page.content: Housing in our block is varied,but not one house is over two storeys high. {Buckhaven}houses,council built in the 1970's,replaced the post war prefabs. The 1950's council and Special Housing scheme in{Methil}has now many houses privately owned.New windows and doors tell us.In{Methilhill,}old pit rows were replaced a few years ago,and 1930's and 1950's council houses are everywhere.Terraced houses near the distillery in{Windygates,}a few 1930 and 1960 council houses and detached cottages,many new,have made{Balcurvie/ Windygates a big village.Our{Kennoway} houses are mainly cottages or new bungalows.{Milton}houses are spinner's cottages,many renovated,some 1930 and 1960 council houses and a bungalow estate built in 1977.New houses, replacing old ones,and new bungalows are being built in Milton.
